Functions
ESM Driver Internal Functions

The section has a list of all the internal functions used by the driver. More...

Functions

void interrupt ESM_highpriority_FIQ (void)
 ESM FIQ interrupt handler: handles Group1 and Group2 high priority errors. Group 3 errors do not raise a FIQ and hence not handled here. More...
 
void ESM_lowpriority_IRQ (uintptr_t arg)
 ESM IRQ interrupt handler: handles Group1 and Group2 low priority errors. Group 3 errors are not handled here. More...
 
void ESM_processInterrupt (uint32_t vec, int32_t *groupNum, int32_t *vecNum)
 Process the ESM interrupts. More...
 

Detailed Description

The section has a list of all the internal functions used by the driver.

Function Documentation

void interrupt ESM_highpriority_FIQ ( void  )

ESM FIQ interrupt handler: handles Group1 and Group2 high priority errors. Group 3 errors do not raise a FIQ and hence not handled here.

void ESM_lowpriority_IRQ ( uintptr_t  arg)

ESM IRQ interrupt handler: handles Group1 and Group2 low priority errors. Group 3 errors are not handled here.

void ESM_processInterrupt ( uint32_t  vec,
int32_t *  groupNum,
int32_t *  vecNum 
)

Process the ESM interrupts.

Parameters
[in]vecvector offset of the highest pending interrupt.
[out]groupNumGroup number to which the offseted input vector belongs.
[out]vecNumVector number in the corresponding group number above.
